plot: Youth, the second work by the independent filmmaker Geng Jun, is a harsh slice of daily life in a part of China that usually doesn't make the headlines.
title: Qingnian
plot_es: Youth, the second work by the independent filmmaker Geng Jun, is a harsh slice of daily life in a part of China that usually doesn't make the headlines.
plot_en: Youth, the second work by the independent filmmaker Geng Jun, is a harsh slice of daily life in a part of China that usually doesn't make the headlines.
